snippet.title: BREAKDOWN E3 2003 Teaser Trailer (Xbox, 2004) [HD]
snippet.description:
Check out the Breakdown Twitter and Facebook pages!
https://www.twitter.com/BreakdownXbox
https://www.facebook.com/BreakdownVideoGame

Teaser trailer shown at E3 2003 for the video game BREAKDOWN, released on the original Xbox in 2004 by Namco.

For the first time ever, this video has been ripped in its original quality from the BREAKDOWN Premium promotional DVD, released exclusively with the Japanese release of R: Racing Evolution.
